segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm due to check out tomorrow , but I'd like to extend my stay by two days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have your name and room number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please wait a moment , Mr . Black . I'll have to check the reservation records ... I'm sorry , but we are expecting several tour groups to arrive today . They have booked all the rooms on the 10th floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't mind transferring to another room , we may manage it for you . We usually have cancellations or no-shows .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's quite all right . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
